If you're looking for a heartwarming movie, I would recommend "The Help" (2011). The movie is based on a true story and follows two African American women in 1960s Jackson, Mississippi who become unlikely allies as they fight against the discrimination they experience.
The movie stars Sandra Bullock as Janie Johnson, the protagonist of the movie, who faces discrimination from her employers at Jackson Hardware. Bullock received widespread critical acclaim for her portrayal of Janie Johnson and was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Actress. The movie has also been well-received by audiences around the world.
Overall, "The Help" is a highly recommended movie that is based on a true story and follows two African American women in 1960s Jackson, Mississippi who become unlikely allies as they fight against the discrimination they experience.
I hope this recommendation helps you find a movie that you will enjoy watching.
